actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the project at Mamaroneck Harbor, New York, relating to the Federal share of the maintenance costs of the project.

summary.text: Modifies the navigation project at Mamaroneck Harbor, New York, to increase the Federal share of such project to 100 percent.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project at Mamaroneck Harbor, New York, relating to the Federal share of the maintenance costs of the project.
